CustomField.formula: IF(AND(Proposed_Run_Date__c < TODAY(), OR(ISPICKVAL(Current_Step__c,"Case Creation"), ISBLANK(TEXT(Current_Step__c)), ISPICKVAL(Current_Step__c,"(1 of 6) Client Load Received - Verifying Load Docs In Progress"), ISPICKVAL(Current_Step__c,"(1 of 4) Client Load Received"), ISPICKVAL(Current_Step__c,"(2 of 6) Load Docs Verified - Client Load In Progress"), ISPICKVAL(Current_Step__c,"(2 of 4) Client Load Complete"), ISPICKVAL(Current_Step__c,"(3 of 6) Client Load Completed - Pre 1st Payroll Run Training In Progress"))), IMAGE("/img/samples/light_red.gif","Red"), IF(AND(OR(Proposed_Run_Date__c = TODAY(), Proposed_Run_Date__c - 1 = TODAY()), OR(ISPICKVAL(Current_Step__c,"Case Creation"), ISBLANK(TEXT(Current_Step__c)), ISPICKVAL(Current_Step__c,"(1 of 6) Client Load Received - Verifying Load Docs In Progress"), ISPICKVAL(Current_Step__c,"(1 of 4) Client Load Received"), ISPICKVAL(Current_Step__c,"(2 of 6) Load Docs Verified - Client Load In Progress"), ISPICKVAL(Current_Step__c,"(2 of 4) Client Load Complete"), ISPICKVAL(Current_Step__c,"(3 of 6) Client Load Completed - Pre 1st Payroll Run Training In Progress"))), IMAGE("/img/samples/light_yellow.gif","Yellow"), IF(OR(ISPICKVAL(Current_Step__c,"Onboarding Complete"), ISPICKVAL(Current_Step__c,"(4 of 6) Pre 1st Payroll Run Training Completed - 1st Payroll Run In Progress"), ISPICKVAL(Current_Step__c,"(5 of 6) 1st Payroll Run Completed - Post 1st Payroll Training In Progress"), ISPICKVAL(Current_Step__c,"(3 of 4) First Payroll Ran"), ISPICKVAL(Current_Step__c,"(4 of 4) Transferred to Payroll Specialist")), IMAGE("/img/samples/light_green.gif","Green"), IF(Proposed_Run_Date__c > TODAY(), IMAGE("/img/samples/light_green.gif","Green"),""))))
CustomField.label: 1st Payrun Warning Indicator
